title: about penx
content: [{"children":[{"text":"About PenX"}],"type":"h1","id":"S4l3rYgE7w","align":"center"},{"children":[{"text":"PenX is a modern tool for creating a dynamic personal blog."}],"type":"p","id":"MhQbzXvlk9","align":"center"},{"children":[{"text":"About the builder"}],"type":"h2","id":"LTdPlZmtGk","align":"center"},{"children":[{"text":"Two year ago, I left @Binance and become a freelancer, I started PenX as a passion project."}],"type":"p","id":"PvW9Npm8tn"},{"children":[{"text":"I am a long-term thinker, and PenX is a product that I really like and believe is worth my long-term investment. In the coming years, I will dedicate all my energy to improving PenX."}],"type":"p","id":"83p24cSaXE"},{"children":[{"text":"There’s no massive team or investors pushing for growth at any cost,just me, running a self-funded, sustainable business. PenX will be supported by its customers, and I have no plans to seek venture funding, which means it’s built to last. I fully expect to still be running it ten years from now."}],"type":"p","id":"SjmB75FCTZ"},{"children":[{"text":"I personally respond to every email, and deeply care about the problems about PenX."}],"type":"p","id":"VHqgN9NQPO"},{"children":[{"text":"Want to be personally onboarded? Find a bug? Email me, and I'll respond. You can get in touch with me "},{"children":[{"text":"Contact the builder"}],"type":"a","url":"https://docs.penx.io/docs/contact","id":"gy5akdtt5D"},{"text":" ."}],"type":"p","id":"JZ5xcMFzoP"}]
